results.content: I dont have 40 hours to spend on learning react , that is where this course is invaluable because it covers all the important topics in an hours time .

response.content: This is great feedback! I’m glad you enjoyed the course.

results.content: This is a great project-based React Course. I was expecting more explanations, but the instructor did a great job teaching students how to refactor code. Sometimes it was difficult to code along because he moved quickly, so I did a lot of pausing and rewinding. This is a great if you're looking to learn through a project-based environment.

response.content: Thanks for the great feedback Andrea! In order to improve on the next course do mind sharing what areas you were hoping to have more explanation on? This will be valuable info for me going forward.
response.content_html: Thanks for the great feedback Andrea! In order to improve on the next course do mind sharing what areas you were hoping to have more explanation on? This will be valuable info for me going forward.

results.content_html: This is a great project-based React Course. I was expecting more explanations, but the instructor did a great job teaching students how to refactor code. Sometimes it was difficult to code along because he moved quickly, so I did a lot of pausing and rewinding. This is a great if you're looking to learn through a project-based environment.

results.content:
This course covers the React fundamental; comparing with few other React online courses that I attended, the materials in this course are much easier to understand and follow; in this course I never need to rewind videos multiple times to learn those "basic but complicated stuffs" like some other courses.  

The course is well-designed for average programmer like me who want to pick up React quickly.  Fast and no time wasted.  A really great introduction course for beginners.
results.content_html:
This course covers the React fundamental; comparing with few other React online courses that I attended, the materials in this course are much easier to understand and follow; in this course I never need to rewind videos multiple times to learn those "basic but complicated stuffs" like some other courses.

The course is well-designed for average programmer like me who want to pick up React quickly. Fast and no time wasted. A really great introduction course for beginners.

results.content: I was very pleased with this lesson. I had previously started with a more advanced tutorial before this, but I should have started with this one. As a PHP developer moving into the modern JS world, it was very helpful starting with only React. No node, no express, no redux, just React clear and concise. I'll give Ryan's next lesson a go no problem.
results.content_html: I was very pleased with this lesson. I had previously started with a more advanced tutorial before this, but I should have started with this one. As a PHP developer moving into the modern JS world, it was very helpful starting with only React. No node, no express, no redux, just React clear and concise. I'll give Ryan's next lesson a go no problem.

results.content:
I love this course, the best part is that it focuses on react and not at all on the other technologies needed to be able to run a react app.

The pace is good, explanations are clear, examples are relevant and very concise.

I like that there are references to the documentation as well, and I would add more of that for the next course when diving deeper into topics.

The audio is good, language is easy to understand.

Also the project of the course was a very good idea with good references to the API used/consumed by the project, with clear explanations of the API endpoints and how we are using them gradually.
results.content_html:

results.content: Demonstrates all the major React features with very clear explanations and real useful examples. Doesn't bloat the course with other libraries and tools. Gets to the point with just React. Highly recommended for beginners or anyone who needs a refresher. Would love to see more from this author.

Gets to the point with just React. Highly recommended for beginners or anyone who needs a refresher. Would love to see more from this author.

results.content: Great course, goes straight to the point. It's a great course to start with React.
results.content_html: Great course, goes straight to the point. It's a great course to start with React.

results.content: This course is great.  It is short but gives good info on basic React structure and components.

response.content: Thanks Michael! I'm glad you liked the course, and thanks again for your support!
response.content_html: Thanks Michael! I'm glad you liked the course, and thanks again for your support!

results.content_html: This course is great. It is short but gives good info on basic React structure and components.

results.content: I like the no fluff just clear core React fundamentals. No dependencies, all you need is a browser (no IDE). Very well organized and Ryan broke it down like one would in a real world task. He also made it fun. I would say this is for beginners but also a refresher for intermediate to advance react developers.
results.content_html: I like the no fluff just clear core React fundamentals. No dependencies, all you need is a browser (no IDE). Very well organized and Ryan broke it down like one would in a real world task. He also made it fun. I would say this is for beginners but also a refresher for intermediate to advance react developers.

results.content: Very well done and well explained.

I enjoy taking this course!

Ryan is an awesome teacher who really knows react in depth. He explains concept in very neat and clear ways.

I have been using react at work for sometime now, but haven't got into depth in react, this course helps me to understand this framework comprehensively. In this course, Ryan expained how to build a react app hand by hand, which made the concepts easier to understand and why they make sense. Ryan made the start of this course very easy by using 'codesandbox', where you can write react code without any setup. He only focused on react in this course as it's for beginners, I hope he can talk about redux in his future courses. Once more, I would recommend this course to everyone!
results.content_html:
I enjoy taking this course!

Ryan is an awesome teacher who really knows react in depth. He explains concept in very neat and clear ways.

I have been using react at work for sometime now, but haven't got into depth in react, this course helps me to understand this framework comprehensively. In this course, Ryan expained how to build a react app hand by hand, which made the concepts easier to understand and why they make sense. Ryan made the start of this course very easy by using 'codesandbox', where you can write react code without any setup. He only focused on react in this course as it's for beginners, I hope he can talk about redux in his future courses. Once more, I would recommend this course to everyone!
